sections.name: Overview
sections.contents: Over the span of my final spring semester at University of Nebraska-Omaha, I experimented with a variety of 2D tools and algorithms. This was in pursuit of a workflow that could transfer artistic styles between games. Specifically, Golden Sun and Darkest Dungeon.

sections.name: Topics Explored
sections.contents:
• Style Adaptation using Google Magenta
  • Post-Processing in Unity
  • Tilemaps in Unity
